title: This Week's Top Stories - Britney Spears Is Free, a Hamster Trades Cryptocurrency & More
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Britney Spears Is Free, a Hamster Trades Cryptocurrency & More
description:
Britney Spears's father loses control of her conservatorship, Switzerland legalizes same-sex marriage, and a hamster becomes a superstar among cryptocurrency enthusiasts.
